text: Pierre Delaunay (9 October 1919 – 24 January 2019)https://www.fff.fr/actualites/184647-pierre-delaunay-s-en-est-alle was the second General Secretary of UEFA. He succeeded his father Henri Delaunay in the post, on an interim basis from his father's death on 9 November 1955 and then officially from 8 June 1956. He died in Versailles on 24 January 2019, aged 99.https://www.uefa.com/insideuefa/about- uefa/history/obituaries/newsid=2590109.html ==References== *UEFA website Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Association football executives Category:UEFA officials
title: Pierre Delaunay
